data.title: Best Movies Like Trespass
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Trespass: Judgment Night (1993), Ricochet (1991), Next of Kin (1989), Deep Cover (1992), Urban Menace (1999), Takers (2010), Assault on Precinct 13 (1976), Road House (1989), New Jack City (1991), The Yellow Sea (2010)
data.text:
Genre: Action, Thriller

Country: USA

Duration: 101 min.

Story: Two Arkansas firemen, Vince and Don, get hold of a map that leads to a cache of stolen gold in an abandoned factory in East St. Louis. What they don't know is that the factory is in the turf of a local gang, who come by to execute one of their enemies. Vince sees the shooting, the gang spots Vince, and extended mayhem ensues. As Vince and Don try to escape, gang leader King James argues with his subordinate Savon about how to get rid of the trespassers.
